Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I told you that this place would lead you
to the underworld, and you still came
back? Oh, hero...
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Is that right?<sp:5:1:0> Well, listen close, hero, and
you'll hear some screams...

<sp:3:0:2:0000>But they're going to be yours!
Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Did you know if you put your ear to a well,
you can hear the wailing of the dead?<sp:5:0:0>
Or so they say, anyway.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Wow, heroes really do know a little bit
about everything!<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0000>And guess what?<sp:5:1:0> You'll be joining those
wailing dead very soon!
